p: For infection, cells were inoculated with virus at indicated multiplicity of infection (MOI) for 1–1.5 hours in a 37°C incubator with occasional rocking. Inoculum was removed, and cells were washed with DMEM and replaced with fresh Dulbecco's Modified Eagle medium (DMEM) +10% fetal bovine serum (FBS) in the presence of compounds or dimethylsulfoxide (DMSO) immediately afterwards. The details of the time-of-addition experiment are supplied in the Supplementary Figure 1 legend.
